discoveries.name: Eco-Friendly Cleaning Solutions Workshop
discoveries.description: A hands-on workshop teaching businesses and individuals how to use sustainable and non-toxic cleaning products to reduce environmental impact.

discoveries.name: Professional Carpet & Upholstery Cleaning Training
discoveries.address: 22 Aba Road, Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria
discoveries.description: A training program designed for those interested in learning the best techniques for deep-cleaning carpets and upholstery using modern equipment.

discoveries.name: High-Rise Window Cleaning Safety Seminar
discoveries.address: 10 Adeola Odeku Street, Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria
discoveries.description: This seminar covers essential safety measures for high-rise building window cleaning, including the use of harnesses and specialized equipment.

discoveries.name: Office & Commercial Cleaning Best Practices
discoveries.description: A business seminar for cleaning service providers, focusing on efficient office cleaning methods and customer service excellence.

discoveries.name: Post-Construction Cleaning Services Showcase
discoveries.description: A demonstration event showing the latest techniques and equipment for post-construction cleaning, ensuring sites are spotless and ready for use.

discoveries.name: Pest Control & Sanitation Awareness Campaign
discoveries.address: 18 Enugu Road, Onitsha, Anambra State, Nigeria
discoveries.description: Educating homeowners and businesses on the importance of pest control as part of overall sanitation efforts to prevent infestations.

discoveries.name: Hospital & Healthcare Facility Hygiene Training
discoveries.address: 7 Olabode Street, Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria
discoveries.description: A specialized training program focusing on maintaining high hygiene standards in hospitals and healthcare centers to prevent infections.

discoveries.name: Residential Deep Cleaning Services Expo
discoveries.description: An exhibition showcasing innovative residential cleaning techniques, products, and services tailored for homeowners.
